issue.title: Msys2 build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3389](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3389). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I am trying to get this to build on a windows machine with msys2 installed.  I can generate a Makefile but nothing happens when I run make.  I think it is because for windows, the cmake file changes the shell to cmd.com.  Under msys2, it should run under the msys shell
